channel.title: Conduit / @conduitxyz
channel.description: Twitter feed for: @conduitxyz. Generated by nitter.freedit.eu

item.title:
RT by @conduitxyz: Thrilled to partner with @conduitxyz!
Their G2 sequencer + Snaxchain enables 50-100 Mgas/s or ~400 trades/s on v4 (an instant UX improvement for traders)
And that’s just the start—another industry leader in rollup research & innovation will take Snaxchain even further
🤖⚡️
item.dc:creator: @Jared_Borders
item.description:

item.title:
RT by @conduitxyz: Snaxchain throughput is crazy now thanks to @conduitxyz G2 ⚡️
250ms blocks at 200m/gas puts trades on @synthetix_io v4 at ~400 trades per second or ~34.56M trades/day.
100% onchain, fully composable, pasture raised, decentralized settlement.
Checkmate tradfi bros.
Milady
item.dc:creator: @MarkBarrasso
item.description:

100% onchain, fully composable, pasture raised, decentralized settlement.

Checkmate tradfi bros.

Milady

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: We're hosting a hacker house at EthDenver with @SuccinctLabs and @celestia.
Feb 26-28.
3 days of collaborating, building, and learning.
Get the details and RSVP below! https://lu.ma/lgitwu7t

item.title:
RT by @conduitxyz: 🚨📊 We’re excited to announce that we’ve completed our integration of @GravityChain!
This integration improves the accessibility of Gravity Alpha Mainnet's data & enables more informed decision-making for all stakeholders in the ecosystem.
Learn more 🧵👇
item.dc:creator: @tokenterminal
item.description:

item.title:

in the trenches. heads-down for scaling. up only.

item.title:
RT by @conduitxyz: looks like @derivexyz is maximally efficient on posting blobs to @celestia 🏇
max throughput, biggest blobs size and lowest price per bytes 😉
powered by @conduitxyz SuperBlobs
max performance and cost effective
h/t @celenium_io (link below)
